title: get_health_endpoint_should_return_status_ok
description: Test the GET /health endpoint to ensure it returns a successful status indicating the system is healthy.

title: products_crud_operations_should_work_correctly
description: Test the GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE /products endpoints to verify products can be created, retrieved, updated, and deleted correctly.

title: get_product_by_barcode_should_return_correct_product
description: Test the GET /products/barcode/{barcode} endpoint to ensure it returns the correct product details for a given barcode.

title: create_transaction_should_record_sale_and_deduct_stock
description: Test the POST /transactions endpoint to verify that a transaction can be created with cashier_id, shift_id, customer_id, payment_method, and items, and that stock is deducted accordingly.

title: shifts_management_should_handle_open_current_zreport_and_close
description: Test the POST /shifts/open, GET /shifts/current, GET /shifts/{id}/z-report, and POST /shifts/{id}/close endpoints to ensure shifts can be opened, retrieved, reported, and closed properly.

title: customers_crud_and_payment_recording_should_work
description: Test the GET, POST, PATCH /customers and POST /customers/{id}/payment endpoints to verify customer records can be managed and payments recorded correctly.

title: held_orders_should_be_held_listed_retrieved_and_deleted
description: Test the POST /orders/hold, GET /orders/held, GET /orders/held/{id}, and DELETE /orders/held/{id} endpoints to ensure held orders can be created, listed, retrieved, and deleted.

title: inventory_upload_should_accept_excel_and_csv_files
description: Test the POST /inventory/upload endpoint to verify that inventory data can be uploaded via Excel or CSV files successfully.

title: print_receipt_and_kick_drawer_should_trigger_printing_actions
description: Test the POST /print/receipt and POST /print/kick-drawer endpoints to ensure printing of receipts and drawer kick actions are triggered correctly.

title: store_settings_should_be_retrieved_and_updated
description: Test the GET and PUT /settings/store endpoints to verify store settings can be retrieved and updated as expected.
